page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF-2.
page.content: Andrew Wheildon is a 14 year old boy living in Butlers Marston and writes of a typical family day thus: "My sister Heather collects her school books,while my mother makes the breakfast.Dad had left for work at 7.30,before I had chance to actually see him.He travels to work by car and works for Automotive Products Leamington,in Leamington Spa,about 10 miles away. After breakfast Heather waits for the bus to take her to Shottery Girls Grammar School in Stratford,about 12 miles away,while I wait for the school bus to take me to Kineton High School,a mixed comprehensive school,just a few miles away.My mother cares for two horses owned by a Mrs. Henderson at "Westmeads",plus two horses and a pony of our own.That consists of exercising grooming and mucking out,most days."
